com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain

Interface CardReaderCapabilities.SupportedPaymentTypes

  • Enclosing interface:
    CardReaderCapabilities

    public static interface CardReaderCapabilities.SupportedPaymentTypes
    SupportedPaymentTypes represents the different payment interfaces a card reader supports. For example, if a card reader has a contactless payment interface, this means the card reader has some hardware capabilities to process contactless payments. Query this object for more detailed information on the payment acceptance capabilities of the current reader.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CardReaderCapabilities.SupportedMagstripeTracks getSupportedMagstripeTracks()
      Detailed information on the different track data that could read/parsed by the card reader device.
      boolean hasChipAndPinEMVSupport()
      Convenience boolean to let you know if the device supports EMV based chip & Pin payments.
      boolean hasContactlessSupport()
      Convenience boolean to quickly let you know if the card reader supports contactless payments.
      boolean hasSwipeSupport()
      Convenience boolean to quickly let you know if the card reader accepts swipe based payments

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedMagstripeTracks

        CardReaderCapabilities.SupportedMagstripeTracks getSupportedMagstripeTracks()
        Detailed information on the different track data that could read/parsed by the card reader device.
        Returns:
        an object indicated whether different tracks could be read by the card reader.

      • hasSwipeSupport

        boolean hasSwipeSupport()
        Convenience boolean to quickly let you know if the card reader accepts swipe based payments
        Returns:
        true if swipe based payments are allowed, false otherwise.

      • hasContactlessSupport

        boolean hasContactlessSupport()
        Convenience boolean to quickly let you know if the card reader supports contactless payments.
        Returns:
        true if contactless payments are allowed, false otherwise.

      • hasChipAndPinEMVSupport

        boolean hasChipAndPinEMVSupport()
        Convenience boolean to let you know if the device supports EMV based chip & Pin payments.
        Returns:
        true if chip & pin payments are allowed, false otherwise.
